item.title: Audio Engineering Tips and Tools
item.description: On this page I give an overview of several tools and resources useful in audio engineering for both, the hobbyist and the semi-professional. Most of the software referred to is for free. I will keep on updating this overview. In my later blogs, I will make use of these tools. Useful Design Information https://www.linkwitzlab.com/ This site gives valuable information about active crossovers and open baffle speaker designs. The site was started by one of the co-founders of the field of audio engineering; Mr.
